offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Aberdeen attempted to steal FLAT SCREEN TV to the value of 750.00, belonging to Howard Ashley.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.

offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Glasgow attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Conner Powell.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.
